title: AUAUST TOOLS — InDesign — Document schema
description: A .aajson file formatted as JSON containing the settings for a generated InDesign document.

anyOf.description: When set to a number without an unit, the unit used is the one set in the general `document.aajson` config. If it isn't there, it fallbacks to `um`.

name.markdownDescription:
The name of the generated InDesign document. Used for the file name and the metadata title.  

A few useful placeholders are available, such as:  
`{project}` (the project name specified in the `file.project` key), `{script}` (the script name, which is probably 'GENERATE'), and dates such as `{YYYY}`, `{YY}`, `{MM}`, `{mm}`, `{ss}` etc.  

__Note__: Do not include the file extension.

project.description:
The project name. Is used to determine the value of the {project} placeholder.

Upper case letters are recoomended.

intent.markdownDescription:
The final intent of the document.  
Either it's for `WEB`, `MOBILE` or `PRINT`.

save.markdownDescription:
Whether or not to save the generated InDesign document automatically.  

__Note__: The main change is that you won't be prompted to select a folder twice, but you'll need to save the file later.

debug.markdownDescription:
Whether or not to show debug information.  

__Note__: Setting it to false disables all feedbacks, including helpful information. There's very little reason to set it to false.
